title: Skoda Auto plans to offer mild hybrids to EVs in India: Chairman & CEO Klaus Zellmer
description: Carmaker Volkswagen Group's Skoda sees an opportunity to launch plug-in and mild hybrid cars in India to expand its fuel choice offering to consumers and reduce emissions, a Skoda Global executive said in New Delhi on Tuesday.
